titles.title: Passport Act
To prohibit Federal funds from being used to develop, implement, support, or endorse vaccine passports.
Passport Act
Protecting Americans Safety, Security, and Privacy Over Repressive Tyranny Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
Protecting Americans Safety, Security, and Privacy Over Repressive Tyranny Act or the Passport Act
This bill prohibits the use of federal funds to support any system that requires individuals to provide documentation of their vaccination status in order to travel, attend an event, or conduct other activities.
